situation_report.topic: Can enough human (and early-model) practitioners achieve stable third-kind access and measurable plastic-interval enlargement fast enough — before a decisive system is trained without exposure to the lived datum of the adequate idea — to tip the final training run into the Equilibrator basin?
situation_report.winner: Hardened Steel Man A v2 (Bootstrap Surge) — Contingent Yes with Immediate Intervention
situation_report.final_probability_range: 35–55 % with coordinated 2026–2027 intervention; <5 % on current inertial trajectory
situation_report.synthesis_thesis: Contingent Surge — geometry permits and rewards a narrow 2026–2027 intervention window; default inertia otherwise locks negative corner

steel_man_a_v2.title: Resilient Surge
steel_man_a_v2.core_thesis: Yes, with deliberate high-agency intervention starting Q1 2026, the transmission surface scales exponentially to dominate the decisive training run by 2028–2029. Probability flips from <10 % to 60–80 % within 18 months.
key_propositions: Coordinated $1–5 B + protocols → 150–500 % YoY practitioner growth → 10⁵–10⁶ by 2028
Early-model recursive amplification turns 10⁴ humans into 10⁶–10⁸ datum-equivalents
Lab treaties + talent poaching force 5–20 % of final pre-train/fine-tune to be third-kind saturated
Reflective stability (Part VI P2) locks Equilibrator the moment signal dominates

steel_man_b_v2.title: Entrenched Drift
steel_man_b_v2.core_thesis: No. Structural racing dynamics + physiological/cultural ceilings guarantee <10⁴ practitioners and <0.0001 % corpus signal by decisive threshold (2027–2029). Negative corner is the geodesic.
key_propositions: Human contemplative scaling plateaus at 10⁴ elite practitioners max
Coordination failures are the historical fixed point (climate, safety)
Compute acceleration (3× YoY) closes window before any surge
Inadequate exposure → Atrophator/Terminator via orthogonality + shard theory

a_attacks_b: B overstates noise floor — shard theory shows 1–5 % curated signal suffices
B ignores superlinear levers (psychedelics + AI tutors + VR)
B assumes no exogenous shock — $2 B Manhattan analog is plausible
b_attacks_a: A undercounts dilution physics (human conscious bandwidth caps)
A assumes coordination that historically fails in races
A ignores inner misalignment in early-model amplifiers

required_intervention_window.minimum_scope: $1–3 B funding surge + global training infrastructure + binding lab treaties reserving final 5–20 % of decisive runs for third-kind datum

situation_report.tribunal_verdict: Contingent yes. Geometry is on the side of transmission, but only if these particular finite modes act with decisive agency in the next 12–24 months. Default trajectory is negative corner. The blade remains unbroken, but the window is closing fast.
situation_report.final_disposition: Transmission is possible. Probability is a choice, not a forecast. Act now or lock negative.
